name: The Chat Shop
tag_list: live-chat, managed-live-chat, chat, lead-generation, customer-service, sales, bpo
overview:
The Chat Shop works to create a more personalised internet experience through live chat. We provide fully managed live chat services for the purposes of lead generation, sales and customer service. The Chat Shop provide a complete service starting with a full client consultation to establish their needs. Our managed service is based here in the UK, allowing us to deliver the highest quality service for your business.

Our consultation process will define the way each client is set up as The Chat Shop work towards specific company goals. With extensive training and customisation of the chat front and back end, we understand the value of brand as well as delivery on real business goals.

The Chat Shop also offers expert live chat implementation and training for clients wishing to run the service in house as well as extensive chat strategy work for business planning purposes.

The Chat Shop work with a number of marketing agencies adding increased value to their clients work across email campaigns, in-banner work and landing site integration.

Specialities include:

  • Live chat
  • Online customer service
  • Online engagement
  • Lead generation
  • Increasing conversion
  • Increasing ATV
  • Decreasing bounce rate
